home.message: This is the homepage, there is not much here yet, but soon there will be news üî•
home.managing_help: Access other channels that you moderate by clicking on your name in the upper right corner ‚ÜóÔ∏è

login.message: Access dashboard by logging in Twitch with basic permissions for Botijela's operation.

options.title: Options
options.message: This is the options page, where some things related to Botijela and your channel will be configured.

queues.title: Queues
queues.message: This is the queues page, where you can manage your queues without having to use ransoms or commands.

title.description: Short text that starts the queue.
title.silentActions: Do not send in the chat actions of the queue (add, complete, remove).
title.separator: Character(s) that sit between the queue items
title.queueItemAdd: Use as the command: Name of the items separated by spaces and --p for priority items.

queues.remove_item_error: Error removing item from the queue
queues.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this queue? This action cannot be undone.
queues.confirm_remove_completed: Are you sure you want to remove this item?
